content: MEMORY COLLECTION TIMING ANALYSIS: Memory collection operates in both async and sync modes. Async operations take 2.4-5.4 seconds due to network calls to mem0AI service. Sync operations use asyncio.run() wrapper taking 2.5+ seconds. Agent operations use await patterns but memory collection can cause blocking delays during task execution.

timing_analysis.concurrency_impact: Multiple operations serialize rather than parallelize

recommendations.implement_background_queue: Move memory collection to background queue to avoid blocking
recommendations.reduce_network_calls: Batch memory operations or use local caching
recommendations.optimize_concurrent_operations: Improve async handling for concurrent memory operations
recommendations.consider_fire_and_forget: Allow tasks to complete without waiting for memory collection
